TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LicenseManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供属性和方法，用以将许可证添加到组件和管理 。

span.span: Provides properties and methods to add a license to a component and to manage a .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了以下`static`属性：和。The class provides the following `static` properties: and . 类还提供了以下`static`方法： ， ，和。The class also provides the following `static` methods: , , and . 在创建你想要许可的组件时，必须执行以下操作：When you create a component that you want to license, you must do the following: 1. 指定通过将标记与组件。Specify the by marking the component with a . 2. 调用或组件的构造函数中。Call or in the constructor of the component. 引发时尝试创建有效许可证的情况下一个实例。 throws a when it tries to create an instance without a valid license. 不会引发异常。 does not throw an exception. 3. 调用上释放或完成组件时，将授予任何许可证。Call on any license that is granted when the component is disposed or finalized. 有关许可的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 许可组件和控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57)。For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8e66c1ed-a445-4b26-8185-990b6e2bbd57). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个授权的控件使用方法。The following code example creates a licensed control using the method. 它使用，其由类。It uses a that is implemented by the class. [!code-cpp[Classic LicenseManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic LicenseManager Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic LicenseManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic LicenseManager Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic LicenseManager Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic LicenseManager Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定为`creationContext`参数用作此生命周期。The you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the for the life of this . 方法进行阻止的所有其他线程修改，允许表现为原子操作。The method blocks all other threads in the from modifying the , allowing to behave as an atomic operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定为`creationContext`参数用作此生命周期。The you specify as the `creationContext` parameter is used as the for the life of this . 该方法会阻止所有其他线程修改，这使表现为原子操作。This method blocks all other threads in the from modifying the , allowing to behave as an atomic operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回`true`时未获得授权，或获得许可的类型和该许可证开始生效。The method returns `true` when the type is either not licensed, or is licensed and the license is valid. 此方法不会引发时不能授予有效。This method does not throw a when it cannot grant a valid . 方法将引发异常。The method throws exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回`true`时`type`参数未获得授权，或者当其已被授权和`license`参数才有效。The method returns `true` when the `type` parameter is not licensed, or when it is licensed and the `license` parameter is valid. 此方法不会引发时不能授予有效。This method does not throw a when it cannot grant a valid . 方法将引发异常。The method throws exceptions. 如果`license`参数不是`null`进行此调用，请求的对象后必须通过调用释放许可证方法时释放的对象或将其完成。If the `license` parameter is not `null` after this call, the object asking for a must dispose of the license by calling the method when the object is disposed of or finalized.
